itinerary.day1Overview: Morning after breakfast, drive to Sultanpur Bird Sanctuary located 48 km from Delhi and 15 km from Gurgaon on the Gurgaon - Farukh Nagar Road. It is an ideal place for birding and bird watchers, best visited in winters when a large number of migratory birds come here. On arrival, check in at the hotel. Rest of the day birding in the sanctuary. Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day2Overview: Morning after breakfast, full day birding in the sanctuary. While birding, you can see Common Hoopoe, Paddyfield Pipit, Purple Sunbird, Little Cormorant, Eurasian Thick-knee, Gray Francolin, Black Francolin, Indian Roller, White-throated Kingfisher, Spot-billed Duck, Painted Stork, White Ibis, Black-headed Ibis, Little Egret, Great Egret, Cattle Egret, Indian Crested Lark, Red-vented Bulbul, Rose-ringed Parakeet, Red-wattled Lapwing, Shikra, Eurasian Collared Dove, Red-collared Dove, Laughing Dove, Spotted Owlet, Rock Pigeon, Magpie Robin, Greater Coucal, Weaver Bird, Bank Myna, Common Myna, and Green Bee-eater. Overnight stay at the hotel.

itinerary.day3Overview: Morning after breakfast, drive back to Delhi.

overView.heading: Discovering Delhi: A Tapestry of History and Modernity
overView.text: Embark on an enchanting journey to Delhi, where ancient traditions blend seamlessly with contemporary cosmopolitan life. Explore the rich cultural heritage, captivating monuments, and vibrant energy, creating a captivating tapestry of past and present.

overView.heading: Iconic Wonders of Old Delhi
overView.text: Unravel the historical marvels of Old Delhi. Wander through the winding lanes of Chandni Chowk, marvel at the grandeur of the Red Fort, and immerse yourself in the vibrant chaos of this ancient district, echoing tales of Mughal emperors and colonial legacies.

overView.heading: Modern Marvels of New Delhi
overView.text: Experience the contemporary allure of New Delhi. Marvel at the impressive architecture of Lutyens' Delhi, indulge in world-class shopping and dining, and embrace the cosmopolitan vibe of the city, where modernity meets historical splendor.

overView.heading: Nature's Oasis: Delhi's Lush Gardens
overView.text: Escape into nature's embrace in Delhi's lush gardens. Admire the vibrant floral displays, stroll through serene landscapes, and find tranquility in the stunning gardens like Lodhi Garden or Mughal Gardens, offering a serene respite amidst the bustling city.

overView.heading: Culinary Delights of Delhi
overView.text: Embark on a gastronomic adventure in Delhi. Indulge in diverse cuisines from around the country, from rich Mughlai delicacies to tantalizing street food. Explore bustling food markets, savor exquisite flavors, and treat your taste buds to a culinary journey like no other.

overView.heading: Preserving Cultural Legacy
overView.text: Delhi is a city that cherishes its cultural heritage. From ancient monuments to vibrant festivals, the city honors its roots while embracing modernity, offering a dynamic cultural experience for both residents and visitors alike.

overView.heading: Plan Your Delhi Exploration
overView.text: Whether drawn to history, nature, or gastronomy, Delhi promises an unforgettable adventure. Plan your exploration of this captivating city, where every corner reveals a story, and every moment is a celebration of Delhi's boundless charm.
